thread.section_title: Sammydress 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Sammydress 的点评意见 | sammydress.com
thread.title: catherine

author: catherine
title: catherine
text: almost one year now i am still waiting for my refund. I have shipped all the items back to Room 201 2nd floor building 8, zhongxin industrial city, chuangye road, shenzhen, guangdong province 518054 china. I spend 100 us dolloars for shipping I should get all my money refund as your company promises me. This is my teenager son hard working money your company should not scam young kid.
